name: Dr. Sarah Chen
title: AI Research Director
bio: AI Research Director at Google with 15+ years of experience in machine learning and artificial intelligence. Pioneer in computer vision and natural language processing.
quote: I love seeing how young innovators apply AI to solve real-world problems.

name: Mark Rodriguez
title: CTO
bio: CTO at HealthTech Innovations, leading the development of next-generation healthcare solutions. Expert in digital health and medical technology.
quote: Healthcare technology has the power to save lives and improve outcomes for everyone.

name: Lisa Thompson
title: Head of Sustainability
bio: Head of Sustainability at Microsoft, leading climate tech initiatives and environmental policy. Passionate about using technology for environmental good.
quote: Technology is our most powerful tool in the fight against climate change.

name: David Kim
title: VP of Engineering
bio: VP of Engineering at Meta, focusing on AR/VR technologies and metaverse development. Expert in immersive technologies and user experience.
quote: The future of human interaction will be shaped by immersive technologies.

name: Dr. Maria Gonzalez
title: Research Scientist
bio: Research Scientist at OpenAI working on AI safety and alignment. Expert in natural language processing and large language models.
quote: Building AI that benefits all of humanity is our greatest challenge and opportunity.

name: James Wilson
title: Founder & CEO
bio: Founder and CEO of EcoTech Ventures, a venture capital firm focused on climate technology startups. Former engineer turned entrepreneur and investor.
quote: Every great solution to climate change starts with an innovative idea.

name: Dr. Priya Patel
title: Chief Medical Officer
bio: Chief Medical Officer at Teladoc Health, leading digital health innovation and telemedicine advancement. Board-certified physician with expertise in health tech.
quote: Technology should enhance the human connection in healthcare, not replace it.

name: Robert Chang
title: Director of AI Ethics
bio: Director of AI Ethics at IBM, focusing on responsible AI development and bias mitigation. Expert in AI governance and ethical technology deployment.
quote: Ethical AI isn't just about avoiding harmâ€”it's about actively promoting fairness and equity.
